name: Phoenix CLI
description: Terminal access for AI coding and AI agent debugging, providing AI assistants access to the same data and tools that human developers use

name: GitHub Copilot now supports OpenCode
description: GitHub Copilot announced formal partnership with OpenCode, supporting authentication for the open-source AI coding agent

name: ChatGPT Memory Improvement
description: OpenAI improved memory for finding details from past chats, enabling more reliable retrieval of information from previous conversations

name: GitHub Copilot CLI - Enhanced Agents Update
description: Major update to GitHub Copilot CLI with enhanced agents, better context management, and new installation methods

name: AI Toolkit for VS Code - January 2026 Update
description: Microsoft's AI Toolkit for VS Code update with enhanced AIAgentExpert, automatic migration capabilities, Eval Tool, Model Catalog, and profiling features

name: Claude Code 2.1.0
description: January 2026 update to Claude Code terminal agent with smoother workflows and smarter agents

name: Shuvcode
description: AI coding agent with both TUI and web app interfaces, featuring structured questioning via wizard UI
